title: Why our report didn't work

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
We were in a good situation at first, after they afked we lost this game.
Then we reported them, but they aren't punished by riot.
Why?????  They are {{champion:12}}  and {{champion:103}} in this game.

replies.body:
Hey whoknow,


As this is a discussion pertaining to one of the Player Behavior & Reform systems [Player Reports; AFKing] in League of Legends, the best place for this discussion would be the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards. I, another Arbiter, or a member of the community would love to have a more in-depth conversation with you about this topic there!
I'm really angry , I reported them but they still can play games without waiting time(20min or more)
